person.persName: John Warren Viley (Co. B, 2nd KY Infantry. Nephew of George Washington Johnson)

body.p: Born in Woodford County, Kentucky, son of Warren Viley and Catharine Jane Martin. (Warren Viley was the brother Ann Eliza Viley, who married Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson). Fought in the Confederate army during the Civil War. Private in R.J. Breckinridge's Company (Company B), 2nd Kentucky Infantry. Died of typhoid, at Bowling Green, Kentucky during the war.
